From the Catskill Mountains to Johnny Carson's Couch Buddy Hackett made America laugh! A Las Vegas institution for ove five decades, his often risque stories are softened by his unique delivery. In the 80's HBO and premium cable service was "the new thing." Concerned that 'giving away' his act on cable would hurt his business at live venues, Hackett was slow to agree. HBO courted Buddy for close to a year before the deal was struck and the date was set. Always a pioneer, the king of stand-up comedy performed before a live audience in a first-of-its-kind, Comedy Special for the cameras of HBO. The program was nominated for a Cable Ace Award. Hackett was as hot as ever. On the heels of much acclaim, Buddy and HBO paired again in '85 recording Buddy Hackett Live and Uncensored 2 which is being offered on this listing Recorded at Caesars Atlantic City October 1985 DIGITALLY RE-MASTERED 55 Minutes of Bonus Material Concert: Running Time: 59 minutes Las Vegas Spotlight: Buddy interviewed by son Sandy Hackett And another bonus this DVD also includes an episode of STANLEY: Buddy's 1956-57 Sit Com Audience Warm-Up Celia's Pen Pal: Episode #9 - Original Air Date: 12/3/56
